uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data

Interface FieldValue<T,X>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of field data
    X - type of owning DataObject
    All Superinterfaces:
    Accessor<T,X>, GroupingSQLValue<T>, SQLAccessor<T,X>, SQLValue<T>, Targetted<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FieldSQLExpression<T,X>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanFieldExpression, DateFieldExpression, FieldExpression, IndexedFieldValue, NumberFieldExpression, StreamDataFieldExpression, StringFieldExpression, TimestampDateFieldExpression, TypeProducerFieldValue

    public interface FieldValue<T,X>
extends SQLAccessor<T,X>, GroupingSQLValue<T>
    SQLAccessor that represents a field in the DataBase
     

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int addField(java.lang.StringBuilder sb, boolean qualify)
      add SQLFragment corresponding to the raw database field.
      java.lang.String getFieldName()
      Get the corresponding field name.
      void setObject(java.sql.PreparedStatement stmt, int pos, T value)
      Add an object of the target type to a prepared statement doing any necessary type conversion to map it to the SQL representation of the object (as generated by addField(StringBuilder, boolean) Note this is only valid if canSet from SQLAccessor returns true.

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldName

        java.lang.String getFieldName()
        Get the corresponding field name. This should not be used to create SQL fragments but can be used to identify Repository field names
        Returns:
        database field name

               T value)
        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add an object of the target type to a prepared statement doing any necessary type conversion to map it to the SQL representation of the object (as generated by addField(StringBuilder, boolean) Note this is only valid if canSet from SQLAccessor returns true.
